name: wristband-python-fastapi-accelerator
description: Full-stack application accelerator with FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "green,yellow" "npm run backend" "sleep 3 && npm run frontend"
scripts.start:debug: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "green,yellow" "cd backend && python3 run.py --debug" "sleep 3 && npm run frontend"
scripts.start:log: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "green,yellow" "cd backend && python3 run.py --log-level=DEBUG" "sleep 3 && npm run frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.setup-python: cd backend && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -e .
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup-python && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.install-firebase: npm install -g firebase-tools && echo 'Firebase tools installed globally. You may need to login with: firebase login'
